TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BuilderPropertyEntry extends System.Web.UI.PropertyEntry
Public MustInherit Class BuilderPropertyEntry Inherits PropertyEntry
public ref class BuilderPropertyEntry abstract : System::Web::UI::PropertyEntry

Docs.summary: Serves as the base class for all property entries that require a control builder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The page parser uses property entry classes during parsing to represent expressions found within server control tags. <xref:System.Web.UI.ComplexPropertyEntry> and <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplatePropertyEntry> both derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.BuilderPropertyEntry> to allow for the specifying of a control builder.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::ControlBuilder ^ Builder { System::Web::UI::ControlBuilder ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::ControlBuilder ^ value); };
member this.Builder : System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the control builder for the property entry.
